DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety 99m-Tc label anti-PD-L1 VHH SPECT/CT diagnostic image Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer compare exist gold standard `` biopsy PD-L1 detection '' . It also establish new method clinical diagnosis NSCLC use 99m-Tc label anti-PD-L1 VHH .
